body: Properties of fundamental electronic devices, analysis of DC, AC small-signal and nonlinear behavior, analog and digital circuit design applications.(Credits: 4)(Prerequisites: NONE)(Additional Attributes: Honors)

title: EE 310H: Electronic Circuit Design I
